basics.name: Sebastián Solórzano
basics.label: Computer Engineer
basics.summary: I am a dedicated, hard working and methodical individual. I have good interpersonal skills, am an excellent team worker and am keen and very willing to learn and develop new skills. I am well organized and always plan ahead to make sure I manage my time well. I have an active and dynamic approach to work and getting things done. I am determined and decisive. Some of my hobbies include music, gaming, excercising and, of course, programming. I have a strong passion about technology, so I am always looking and staying up to date with new technologies and advancements.

work.name: Altamar
work.summary: This is a mobile application made for fishermans to publish and sell their catchings, aswell as for customers to find and buy fish. It was developed using the React Native framework and works with Android and iOS.
highlights: Learned how to work with the React and React native frameworks
Mainly frontend experience with some backend here and there

awards.title: Scrum Fundamentals Certified
awards.summary: Successfully passed the Scrum Fundamentals Certified exam.
